title: Trump notifies 7 countries of higher tariffs
shortDescription: President Donald Trump notified seven more countries they would be hit with higher tariffs starting August 1.

title: Senegal's leader flatters Trump with comments about golf skills
shortDescription: Senegal's President Bassirou Diomaye Faye flattered Trump as a 'tremendous' golfer and invited him to build an African course during trade talks.

title: Gamblers are furious over obscure provision in Trump's big tax bill
shortDescription: An obscure provision in Donald Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' reduces the amount gamblers can deduct from taxes for betting losses.

title: Trump's NOAA appointee fields Senate questions
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's NOAA appointee answered questions on budget and staffing cuts during his confirmation hearing.

title: Trump administration subpoenas Harvard, targets accreditation
shortDescription: The Department of Homeland Security subpoenaed Harvard University over records related to foreign students.

title: Trump hits Philippines and 6 more countries with higher tariffs
shortDescription: The notices bring the total number of countries Trump has hiked tariffs on this week to 21. The higher rates are slated to take effect on August 1.

title: Trump will move immediately to lay off federal workers
shortDescription: For now, the Trump administration can continue with a February plan for large-scale layoffs.

title: Polls: Trump's approval rating among Black voters is sinking
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s approval rating among Black Americans is sinking, according to some polls.

title: SCOTUS lets Trump proceed with major staff cuts for now | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: The death toll continues to rise in the aftermath of Texas flooding. | Harvard and other Ivy League schools dealt major blow in spending bill.

title: Trump to Scotland? Police get ready for presidential visit
shortDescription: President Trump owns two golf courses in Scotland, one on the northeast coast and another south of Glasgow on the west coast.

title: Patience fraying, Trump hammers Putin, offers Ukraine a lifeline
shortDescription: Trump’s decision to help Ukraine fight an onslaught of Russian attacks reverses a Pentagon decision to withhold defensive weapons.

title: Russia attacks Ukraine with 700 drones after Trump weapons pledge
shortDescription: Russia targeted Ukraine with a record 728 drones overnight, shortly after Trump pledged to send more defensive weapons to Kyiv.

title: Netanyahu and Trump prioritize Gaza hostages and Hamas ceasefire
shortDescription: Netanyahu said his meeting with Trump focused on freeing hostages in Gaza, and stressed his determination to "eliminate" the capabilities of Hamas.

title: Gazans reject Trump's displacement plan despite death and destruction
shortDescription: Five days after becoming president in January, Trump said Jordan and Egypt should take in Palestinians from Gaza.

title: Florida woman arrested outside Mar-a-Lago with 'message' for Trump
shortDescription: Driving with a suspended license and firearms in the car, Caroline Shaw of Orlando was arrested outside Mar-a-Lago on July 7.

title: What is featured in Trump's Cabinet Room tour?
shortDescription: Trump has also been on a mission to give the White House a facelift, from blinging out the Oval Office in gold accents to redoing the Rose Garden

title: Trump slaps tariffs on copper imports and teases pharmaceutical tax
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said pharmaceutical imports would face a "very high rate, like 200%" and he would impose the tariff at a later date.

title: Trump bill hikes endowment tax for Harvard, other Ivies
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's massive tax and spending package levies a hefty tax on the universities with the largest endowments.

title: Trump administration grilled on Epstein memo
shortDescription: The Justice Department has released a memo on Jeffrey Epstein, declaring there is no "client list" despite the attorney general's past mentions of it.
